meanings.definition: Having a single germ or seed
meanings.sent1: The monogerm seed grew into a beautiful flower.
meanings.sent2: The farmer planted monogerm seeds in the field.
meanings.sent3: The monogerm seed was so special, it sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her monogerm idea blossomed into a successful project.
meanings.sent5: The monogerm seed held the promise of new life.

meanings.definition: A plant that produces only one seed per fruit
meanings.sent1: The monogerm plant in the garden bore delicious fruits.
meanings.sent2: The monogerm is known for its unique reproductive pattern.
meanings.sent3: The monogerm plant seemed to wink at the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: In a world of variety, she stood out like a monogerm plant.
meanings.sent5: The monogerm's fruit was a treasure among the harvest.
